ItemTooltips.blink:
YOU CAN USE THIS IF YOU HAVE TROUBLE SETTING UP DUELS DUE TO ENEMIES FLEEING LIKE THE WHELPS THEY ARE.

(ALTERNATIVE: SHADOW BLADE, BUT SINCE 6.80 I ADVISE AGAINST IT SINCE BLINK COSTS 0 MANA)
ItemTooltips.quelling_blade: YOU'RE GOING TO CHILL IN THE JUNGLE FOR A BIT SO YOU MIGHT WANT TO BUY THIS
ItemTooltips.stout_shield: CREEPS HIT HARD, NOW THEY DON'T
ItemTooltips.flask: WHO NEEDS TANGOS WHEN YOU CAN PRESS THE ATTACK, A SALVE WILL SUFFICE.
ItemTooltips.travel_boots: ENEMIES ARE GOING TO RUN WHEN THEY SEE YOU, RUN FASTER.
ItemTooltips.hyperstone: GET THIS ASAP, THEN YOU CAN BUILD IT INTO CUIRASS OR MAELSTROM. ALSO YOU WILL ATTACK VERY FAST, WHICH IS NICE I GUESS
ItemTooltips.power_treads: THE MANLIEST BOOTS FOR THE MANLIEST HERO
ItemTooltips.assault: THE BEST ITEM TO GET ON LC. MAKE SURE NO ONE ELSE IN THE TEAM IS MAKING IT FOR MAXIMUM EFFICIENCY, AND IF THEY'RE BUILDING IT, FUCK IT, BUY IT ANYWAY
ItemTooltips.heart: WHAT A GREAT ITEM. NO REALLY. IF YOU MANAGED TO BUY THIS THE GAME IS PROBABLY OVER ALREADY (ARMLET REPLACEMENT)
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: THEIR DISABLES ARE KEEPING YOU FROM WINNING DUELS? GET THIS BEFORE BASHER
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: USE IT BEFORE THE DUEL AND WATCH YOUR OPPONENT SHIT HIMSELF
ItemTooltips.armlet:
WHO CARES ABOUT LOSING HP WHEN YOU CAN PRESS W AND REGAIN IT ALL? REMEMBER YOU CAN'T ACTIVATE IT ONCE YOU'RE IN THE DUEL, SO DO IT BEFOREHAND.

YOU CAN GET A BLINK DAGGER FIRST IF YOU FEEL LIKE SETTING UP GANKS EARLIER.
ItemTooltips.invis_sword:
YOU CAN CHOOSE THIS IF YOU DON'T LIKE BLINK TO GAIN A FEW STATS AND AN ESCAPE.

HOWEVER THIS IS NOT AS GOOD BECAUSE IT'S TRICKIER TO CAST PRESS THE ATTACK BEFORE DUELING. ALSO IN 6.80 BLINK COSTS 0 MANA, THINK ABOUT THAT.
ItemTooltips.mjollnir: THE PROC ON THIS THING WORKS WITH DESOLATOR, IT'S A NICE BOOST OF DPS BUT YOU CAN SWITCH IT WITH AN ITEM IN THE LAST SECTION IF DESIRED.
ItemTooltips.maelstrom: GET THIS FIRST IF AC IS TOO HARD TO BUILD OR IF SOMEONE ELSE MAKES AC. WHATEVER.
ItemTooltips.desolator: YOUR PASSIVE LIFESTEAL ISN'T AN ATTACK MODIFIER, SO YOU CAN BUILD THIS AND DO MASSIVE DAMAGE
ItemTooltips.diffusal_blade: YOU CAN GET THIS INSTEAD OF DESOLATOR IF GOING AGAINST A LOT OF MANA HEAVY HEROES. WHY? -BECAUSE YOU ATTACK SO FAST YOU DRAIN ALL THEIR MANA IN A SECOND. ALSO YOU CAN PREVENT THEM FROM ESCAPING YOU AFTER A DUEL
ItemTooltips.abyssal_blade: FOR ALL YOUR BASHING NEEDS. THIS IS A GREAT ITEM TO USE BEFORE OR AFTER A DUEL.

AbilityTooltips.legion_commander_overwhelming_odds: GET THIS LATER, BECAUSE FIGHTS IN THE EARLY/MIDGAME AREN'T THAT PACKED. THEN USE IT EVERYTIME YOU SEE A CLUTTER OF ENEMIES. THE MORE HEROES IN THE AOE THE BETTER!
AbilityTooltips.legion_commander_press_the_attack: USE IT BEFORE A DUEL TO GET THAT SWEET ATTACK SPEED, ALSO A GREAT TOOL TO REGEN/PUSH TOWERS.
AbilityTooltips.legion_commander_moment_of_courage: YOU HAVE TO BE ATTACKING THE TARGET TO HIT BACK.
AbilityTooltips.legion_commander_duel:
ONCE YOU GET THIS BABY, TRY TO SET UP A GANK ON THE EASYLANE. WATCH AS YOU SNOWBALL OUT OF CONTROL.

NEVER ENGAGE IN A DUEL YOU WILL LOSE. YOU DON'T WANT TO BE "THAT GUY".
